annotations.description: On this episode of How to Drink, I’m taking a look at the rum staple, the Mojito. The Mojito is of course the famed national drink of Cuba and came to promin...
annotations.title: Mojito | How to Drink

textContent:
1oz Lime juice
.5oz Simple syrup
5-7 mint leaves muddled
2oz rum

Build in glass
Top with seltzer
Garnish with mint

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3DA2GmkTmEU
title: Mojito
